mapper.update: update consumer set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usergroupId = #{usergroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conpassword = #{conpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adaress = #{adaress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where consumerId = #{consumerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select consumerId, name, sex, usergroupId, conpassword, phone, birthday, adaress, remarks from consumer where consumerId = #{consumerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select consumerId, name, sex, usergroupId, conpassword, phone, birthday, adaress, remarks from consumer
